node.title: Panel: Workplace Dilemmas & Business Ethics For the Christian
node.description: We are living in a day when, as Christians in the workplace, we are confronted by perplexities and challenges arising on new horizons; and yet, as never before, the opportunities to share Christ are ever present. Draw from the wealth of godly wisdom and experience in this enlightening panel discussion, consisting solely of ASI past presidents, as we explore how to navigate through contemporary workplace dilemmas using biblical principles as our guide.
